                                +--unbbayes.fronteira.MDIDesktopPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MDIDesktopPane
extends javax.swing.JDesktopPane

An extension of JDesktopPane that supports often used MDI functionality. This class also handles setting scroll bars for when windows move too far to the left or bottom, providing the MDIDesktopPane is in a ScrollPane.

See Also:
